CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 18, 1960, pg. B7 reads: "1. A Glamorous Fashion Show presented by Marlene M..."Fashions for M'Lady" Courier columnist, awed both female and male visitors...Shown with Marlene is Beatrice Hall, who brought the house down with a most...comedy skit on how NOT to dress."
TitMainTitle: Courier columnist Marlene, and Beatrice Hall wearing costume attire, during fashion show in Syria Mosque for the 1960 Courier-WAMO Home-A-Rama
